name: Kitchen UI
description:
Are you looking to buy new cabinets for your kitchen, or perhaps a total remodel? I made this tool to help DIY designers plan their new kitchen!


It is also a great way to learn Figma with introductions to components and variants.


Cabinets use auto layout so that you can simply drag to resize them and they will retain correct dimensions.


Kitchen UI has two parts.

  1. Measure - Enter your kitchen measurements using a variety of custom components.
  2. Design - Easily replace your measurements with high-fidelity items to get to a nice-looking kitchen quickly.
